name: Cephalite Resonance
description: Cephalite Resonance used to enter the Glassmaker's Weave

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.6 + 28.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cephalite Resonance not being shared between squadmates in Railjack if the player who collected the Resonance was at the 20 cap.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Cephalite Resonance Tears and Nora Night transmissions will no longer occur during Quest missions.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes:
The amount of Cephalite Resonance to enter the Weave has been cut in half. The requirement is now 5 instead of 10.
Your Cephalite Resonance count, as well as the amount required for the Weave, is now displayed upon hover on the Glassmaker crime scene episode selector.

patchlogs.name: Nightwave Series 3: Glassmaker: Hotfix 27.5.4
patchlogs.changes: Cephalite Resonance is now linkable in Chat which can also reveal the amount in your Inventory.

patchlogs.name: Nightwave Series 3: Glassmaker: Hotfix 27.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Cephalite Resonance in Railjack not being shared between all squadmates.

name: Cetus Wisp
description: Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon Remaster: Hotfix 24.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cena Apparel Blueprint and Vahd Apparel Blueprint requiring 5 Cetus Wisps by swapping it to 5 Eidolon Gems.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Standing cost of Cetus Wisps from 10k to 5k.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Toroids and Cetus Wisps disappearing over-time if enough other pickups drop.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23
patchlogs.changes: Moved Cetus Wisp and Maprico Tree spawn points a bit further away from water volumes in the NW corner of the Plains for gathering ease.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.changes: Quill Onkko has added a Cetus Wisp to his Offerings in Cetus. These can be purchased with Quill Standing for Architect level Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up a Syndicate Medallion or Cetus Wisp (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Cetus Wisp will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Ghoul Bounty tables have received new items including Nitain, Cetus Wisps, and Breath of the Eidolon!

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: More than doubled the size of the Cetus Wisp pickup radius. This will allow you to obtain the Cetus Wisp from further away instead of needing to be right on top of it.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cetus Wisps being updated while the game was paused -

patchlogs.changes: You’ll now gain Solaris Standing upon freeing the Solaris captives in the Granum Void! The amount of Standing gained is dependent on saving all 3 captives is dependent on the tier of Granum Crown used:
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients not receiving the Credit reward when using a Granum Crown in a Temple Relief after collecting all the Tenant entries.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Added Lotus VO when a Granum Crown has been used in a Golden Hand Tribute.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.3
patchlogs.changes:
Granum Crowns dropped by Treasurers are now exempt from ‘loot Abilities’.
The Treasurer will drop 1 Granum Crown per player as intended.
If the Treasurer is within 35 meters of Extraction, he will now turn away and run to the nearest Golden Hand Tribute to avoid dying in the Extraction zone. If by chance a Granum Crown is dropped too close to the Extraction zone, they will now be teleported to a safe place. This addresses reports such as: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1199639-treasurer-drops-coin-on-extract/
Fixed Granum Crown waypoints not extending past its zone.
Tweaked the Credit acquisition FX upon using a Granum Crown at the Temple Relief after your last Tenant Lore reward. The Temple Relief will now show the last Tenant Lore entry when you have collected all of them and are receiving Credits instead of new lore.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inability for Clients to spend a Granum Crown at a Golden Hand Tribute if the Host had already used that exact Tribute with the same tier of Granum Crown.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes:
The portals are built through Golden Hand Tributes, a spot of profit-worship for faithful Corpus. By spending their Granum Crowns, a valuable manifestation of their devotion, the Corpus can open a rift and send expeditions to Void sites.
Thankfully, you can use these Granum Crowns to your advantage. Collect three tiers of Crowns from Treasurers in your Missions, each signifying a higher level of devotion than the last: Granum Crown, Exemplar Granum Crown, and Zenith Granum Crown. Use them to initiate challenges in Missions, search for Corpus Temple Reliefs or negotiate the release of Solaris prisoners in exchange for Standing.
0-15: Granum Crown
16-30: Exemplar Granum Crown
31+: Zenith Granum Crown
*Granum Crowns will not appear from Treasurers until you complete The Deadlock Protocol Quest.
Granum Crowns can also be spent at the Corpus Temple Reliefs in Missions to learn more about the Founder. Each new story you acquire will earn you Relief Decorations for your Orbiter!

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Zenith Granum Crown: 900 Solaris Standing

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.changes:
Thankfully, you can use these Granum Crowns to your advantage. Collect three tiers of Crowns from Treasurers in your Missions, each signifying a higher level of devotion than the last: Granum Crown, Exemplar Granum Crown, and Zenith Granum Crown. Use them to initiate challenges in Missions, search for Corpus Temple Reliefs or negotiate the release of Solaris prisoners in exchange for Standing.
31+: Zenith Granum Crown
